short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Very useful for day to day works

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The chrome-tab-task-manager is a feature-rich Chrome extension that offers both
Tab management and task tracking capabilities. Users can set a maximum limit on
the number of open tabs in their browser while also efficiently managing and
tracking tasks  and duration associated with those tabs.User can limit the webpage time.
